verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>: for it is good <WH2896> to sing praises <WH2167> <WH8763> unto our 'Elohim <WH430>; for it is pleasant <WH5273>; and praise <WH8416> is comely <WH5000>.
The YY <WH3068> doth build up <WH1129> <WH8802> Yerushalayim <WH3389>: he gathereth together <WH3664> <WH8762> the outcasts <WH1760> <WH8737> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
He healeth <WH7495> <WH8802> the broken <WH7665> <WH8803> in heart <WH3820>, and bindeth up <WH2280> <WH8764> their wounds <WH6094>.
He telleth <WH4487> <WH8802> the number <WH4557> of the stars <WH3556>; he calleth <WH7121> <WH8799> them all by their names <WH8034>.
Great <WH1419> is our YY <WH113>, and of great <WH7227> power <WH3581>: his understanding <WH8394> is infinite <WH4557>.
The YY <WH3068> lifteth up <WH5749> <WH8767> the meek <WH6035>: he casteth <WH8213> the wicked <WH7563> down <WH8213> <WH8688> to the ground <WH776>.
Sing <WH6030> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> with thanksgiving <WH8426>; sing praise <WH2167> <WH8761> upon the harp <WH3658> unto our 'Elohim <WH430>:

Who covereth <WH3680> <WH8764> the heaven <WH8064> with clouds <WH5645>, who prepareth <WH3559> <WH8688> rain <WH4306> for the earth <WH776>, who maketh grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> <WH8688> upon the mountains <WH2022>.
He giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> to the beast <WH929> his food <WH3899>, and to the young <WH1121> ravens <WH6158> which cry <WH7121> <WH8799>.
He delighteth <WH2654> <WH8799> not in the strength <WH1369> of the horse <WH5483>: he taketh not pleasure <WH7521> <WH8799> in the legs <WH7785> of a man <WH376>.
The YY <WH3068> taketh pleasure <WH7521> <WH8802> in them that fear <WH3373> him, in those that hope <WH3176> <WH8764> in his mercy <WH2617>.
Praise <WH7623> <WH8761> the YY <WH3068>, O Yerushalayim <WH3389>; praise <WH1984> <WH8761> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, O TZiyon <WH6726>.
For he hath strengthened <WH2388> <WH8765> the bars <WH1280> of thy gates <WH8179>; he hath blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> thy children <WH1121> within <WH7130> thee.
He maketh <WH7760> <WH8802> peace <WH7965> in thy borders <WH1366>, and filleth <WH7646> <WH8686> thee with the finest <WH2459> of the wheat <WH2406>.
He sendeth forth <WH7971> <WH8802> his Mitzvah <WH565> upon earth <WH776>: his word <WH1697> runneth <WH7323> <WH8799> very swiftly <WH4120>.
He giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> snow <WH7950> like wool <WH6785>: he scattereth <WH6340> <WH8762> the hoarfrost <WH3713> like ashes <WH665>.
He casteth forth <WH7993> <WH8688> his ice <WH7140> like morsels <WH6595>: who can stand <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> his cold <WH7135> ?
He sendeth out <WH7971> <WH8799> his word <WH1697>, and melteth <WH4529> <WH8686> them: he causeht his wind <WH7307> to blow <WH5380> <WH8686>, and the waters <WH4325> flow <WH5140> <WH8799>.
He sheweth <WH5046> <WH8688> his word <WH1697> <WH8675> <WH1697> unto Ya`akov <WH3290>, his statutes <WH2706> and his judgments <WH4941> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
He hath not dealt <WH6213> <WH8804> so with any nation <WH1471>: and as for his judgments <WH4941>, they have not known <WH3045> <WH8804> them. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>.
